createModule

public static com.google.inject.Module createModule(org.apache.twill.zookeeper.ZKClientService zkClientService,
                                                    com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListeningExecutorService executorService,
                                                    Configuration conf)
                                             throws Exception
Creates a Guice module for dependency injection.

Parameters:
zkClientService - zookeeper client to use for queues and id generation.
executorService - executor service to use for solving cluster layouts.
conf - Configuration containing relevant settings.
Returns:
Guice module for dependency injection.
Throws:
Exception
